review: I love it I love it I love it!!!!  Even better then my xbox 1 or apple tv :D
author: Jared Bartlett

review: I'm suprised to find out that you have to pay for some old Paul Newman movies.....Give me a break folks at Amazon Prime....
author: Harley "One"

review: Love it. Hands down. Some features I wish it had, but overall a solid machine. Games, music, apps, you name it, Fire TV has it! Would recommend! love love love it!!
author: Michael Morris

review: There is a lot of content requiring pay to watch even with Amazon Prime.
author: Wojtek

review: So far so good.  Some of the classiest packaging I've ever seen. (-;  The device is very user friendly.  Haven't tried the game options as yet.  I think it's a great buy for the price.  I've already got Amazon Prime. That seems to help.
author: gbaron64

review: This box is awesome!  I also own the chrome cast....no comparison
author: Karen Boyd

review: There are some things I like and some things I don't like.  Personally, if I love my AppleTv, but it doesn't have things like Sling and Amazon instant video.  If Apple would let people use those services it would be best.
author: dendritic_growth
